title: Lesley Brett
text:
Lesley Brett (b. 15 March, 1968) is a former New Zealand <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. She made her <a href="New%20Zealand%20women%27s%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Black Ferns</a> debut at <a href="RugbyFest%201990">RugbyFest 1990</a> against <a href="Netherlands%20women%27s%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Netherlands</a>. Brett competed at the <a href="1991%20Women%27s%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">1991 Women's Rugby World Cup</a>; she scored a hat-trick in their game against <a href="Wales%20women%27s%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Wales</a>.
Personal life.
Brett is the mother of former <a href="Crusaders%20%28rugby%20union%29">Crusaders</a> and <a href="Blues%20%28Super%20Rugby%29">Blues</a> fly-half, <a href="Stephen%20Brett">Stephen Brett</a>. She was married to former <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">All Black</a>, <a href="Victor%20Simpson">Victor Simpson</a>.
